channel.title: Chemicals on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Chemicals on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: We Can Get Rid of Carcinogens and Forever Chemicals in Drinking Water. Will We Do It?
item.description: New research shows that filtration systems that remove PFAS can also get rid of other harmful substances. Whether they’ll actually be introduced is a different matter entirely.
